promptPwa.title: Chooselife APP
promptPwa.description: Install to have a better experience

steps.first: Tap the "Share" button in the Safari browser toolbar.
steps.second: Scroll down and tap the "Add to Home Screen" option.
steps.third: Tap the "Add" button in the top right corner.
steps.fourth: The APP will now appear on your home screen.
